description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Crusted Prawns With Mango Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coconut Crusted Prawns With Mango Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg green prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
1 tsp red chilli, finely sliced (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut cheeks from mangoes and scoop out flesh. Dice and place in a bowl. Scoop seeds from cucumber and discard. Dice cucumber. Wash and finely chop coriander root. Remove sprigs from coriander. Add cucumber, lime rind, juice, coriander, sugar and fish sauce to mango. Season to taste. Toss to combine.
Combine breadcrumbs and coconut in a bowl. Lightly coat prawns with flour, dip in beaten egg and roll in coconut mixture. Place on a tray.

Heat oil in a saucepan over medium- high heat. Cook prawns in batches for 3 minutes, or until golden and crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon and transfer to a paper towel-lined tray. Garnish with chilli and coriander leaves and serve immediately with mango salsa and lime wedges.
